articles.title: Hindenburg Research, a short seller that targeted tech and EV companies, is closing up shop - TechCrunch
articles.description: When Hindenburg Research posts a blog on its website, it often means a company's final days are near. Today, that company is Hindenburg Research. Nate
articles.content:
